Title: Bound in Stone
Description:
Some of our warriors were camped in the small settlement near Guo-Lai when the Baruk invaded the area. Some managed to escape, but they returned with tales of their brothers and sisters in arms being petrified by the mogu stoneshapers into living statues!

We can't leave our warriors behind! 

The stoneshapers must carry some means to reverse the spell and free them from their stone prisons. Bring our soldiers back!
ObjectivesText: Collect Stoneshaper Rods from Baruk Stoneshapers and use them to free 5 Petrified Warriors in the Ruins of Guo-Lai.
